Notes.Text:
This update for ImageMagick fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2025-43965: mishandling of image depth after SetQuantumFormat is used in MIFF image processing (bsc#1241659).
- CVE-2025-46393: mishandling of packet_size and rendering of channels in arbitrary order in multispectral MIFF image
  processing (bsc#1241658).

Other issues fixed:
  
- Restore SUSE specific hardening config policies that got lost in refactoring (bsc#1243622).
Notes.Title: Details
